name: Totally Safe Kinder
description:
You have to take care of a preschool where the children, as usual, have a tendency to hurt themselves. Your job is to prevent this. Click on the children to pick them up and throw them away, if enough children are injured you will be fired.

Content:

  • Intense child throwing
  • Epic child animations
  • A beutiful world
  • A basket and a child throwing mechanic, you can figure out the rest ;)

Winner of LBS 24Hours Game Jam! :D

Credits:
